Colors

Color palette comprises primary and accent colors. To add a background color to element add corresponding primary class together with accent class, for example red darken-1. You can also change the color of text by prefixing primary and accent classes, for example text-red text-darken-1.

  • red lighten-5
  • red lighten-4
  • red lighten-3
